movies.title: Le voyage des comédiens
movies.plot: A group of traveling players peregrinates through Greece attempting to perform the popular erotic drama Golfo The Shepherdess. In a first level the film focuses on the historical events between 1939 and 1952 as they are experienced by the traveling players and as they affect the villages which they visit: The last year of Metaxas' fascist dictatorship, the war against the Italians, the Nazi occupation, the liberation, the civil war between left and right wingers, the British and American interventionism in the Greek politics. In a second level the characters live their own drama of jealousy and betrayal, with its roots in the ancient myth of the House of Atreus. Agamemnon, a Greek refugee from Minor Asia, goes to war against the Italians in 1940, joins the resistance against the Germans, and is executed by them after being betrayed by Clytemnestra and Aegisthos. Aegisthos, Clytemnestra's lover, is an informer and collaborator working with the German occupiers. Orestes, son of ...
movies.simplePlot: Greece 1939 - 1952 Fascist, Nazi, Communist conflict as seen through a family of travelling provincial players

biography.bio: Eva Kotamanidou was born on March 16, 1936 in Athens, Greece. She is an actress, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Paysage dans le brouillard (1988) and Alexandre le Grand (1980).
biography.name: Eva Kotamanidou

biography.bio: Aliki Georgouli was born in 1933. She was an actress, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Paysage dans le brouillard (1988) and Synoikia to Oneiro (1961). She was married to Alekos Alexandrakis. She died on July 25, 1995 in Athens, Greece.
biography.name: Aliki Georgouli

biography.bio: Vangelis Kazan was born in 1936 in Nafplio, Greece as Vangelis Kazantzoglou. He was an actor and director, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Days of 36 (1972) and Paysage dans le brouillard (1988). He died on March 10, 2008 in Athens, Greece.
biography.name: Vangelis Kazan

biography.bio: Stratos Pahis was born in 1928 as Efstratios Pahis. He was an actor, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Paysage dans le brouillard (1988) and Ta plouti tou Mida (1973). He died on April 17, 1996.
biography.name: Stratos Pahis

biography.bio: Maria Vassiliou was an actress, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Evdokia (1971) and Sensuelle et perverse Maya (1973). She died in 1989 in England.
biography.name: Maria Vassiliou

biography.bio: Petros Zarkadis is an actor, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Days of 36 (1972) and Jour de repos (1982).
biography.name: Petros Zarkadis

biography.bio: Kiriakos Katrivanos was born in 1937 in Athens, Greece. He is an actor, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Paysage dans le brouillard (1988) and Sta skoteina (1986).
biography.name: Kiriakos Katrivanos

biography.bio: Giannis Fyrios was born in 1913 in Andros, Greece as Ioannis Fyrios. He was an actor, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Paysage dans le brouillard (1988) and Le regard d'Ulysse (1995). He died in April 2007 in Athens, Greece.
biography.name: Giannis Fyrios

biography.bio: Nina Papazaphiropoulou is an actress, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Paysage dans le brouillard (1988) and Closed Window (1977).
biography.name: Nina Papazaphiropoulou

biography.bio: Alekos Boubis is an actor, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), Days of 36 (1972) and La faille (1975).
biography.name: Alekos Boubis

biography.bio: Grigoris Evangelatos is an actor, known for Paysage dans le brouillard (1988), Alexandre le Grand (1980) and Le voyage des comédiens (1975).
biography.name: Grigoris Evangelatos

biography.bio: Giorgos Tzifos was born in 1918. He was an actor, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), For the Love of Benji (1977) and Days of 36 (1972). He died on May 27, 1986 in Athens, Greece.
biography.name: Giorgos Tzifos

biography.bio: Kosta Stiliaris is an actor, known for Le voyage des comédiens (1975), To kanoni kai t' aidoni (1968) and O Astrapogiannos (1970).
biography.name: Kosta Stiliaris

biography.bio: Takis Doukatos is an actor, known for Days of 36 (1972), Le voyage des comédiens (1975) and John the Violent (1973).
biography.name: Takis Doukatos

biography.bio: Thanos Grammenos was born as Athanasios Grammenos. He is an actor, known for Le regard d'Ulysse (1995), Reconstitution (1970) and Days of 36 (1972).
biography.name: Thanos Grammenos

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Nominated Award of the Japanese Academy
